blocks.name: meran1
blocks.content: A single axiom for propositional calculus discovered by C. A. Meredith. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm meran1(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wo(wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4)))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w3), w0)), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0))))
} = {
  imori(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w3), w0)), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0))))
  3imtr3i(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w3), w0)), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0))), wi(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wi(wo(wn(w3), w0), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0))))
  syl2im(wi(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(w3), w0), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wi(w3, w0))
  imim1i(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4)), wi(w0, w1))
  ja(w0, w1, wo(wn(w0), w1))
  orc(wn(w0), w1)
  olc(w1, wn(w0))
  com12(wo(wn(w3), w0), w3, w0)
  jaod(w3, wn(w3), w0, w0)
  pm2.24(w3, w0)
  idd(w3, w0)
  3imtr4i(wi(wi(w0, w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wi(wi(w3, w0), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0))), wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(wi(w3, w0)), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0))))
  3syl(wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(wi(w3, w0)), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0))), wo(w2, wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wo(w3, w4))), wo(w2, wo(wn(wi(w3, w0)), wo(w4, w0))))
  pm1.5(wn(wi(w0, w1)), w2, wo(w3, w4))
  orim2i(w2, wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wo(w3, w4)), wo(wn(wi(w3, w0)), wo(w4, w0)))
  4syl(wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wo(w3, w4)), wo(wn(wi(w3, w0)), wo(w4, w0)), wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wo(w4, w3)), wo(w4, wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), w3)), wo(w4, wo(wn(wi(w3, w0)), w0)))
  pm2.3(wn(wi(w0, w1)), w3, w4)
  pm1.5(wn(wi(w0, w1)), w4, w3)
  orim2i(w4, wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), w3), wo(wn(wi(w3, w0)), w0))
  3imtr3i(wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), w3), wo(wn(wi(w3, w0)), w0), wi(wi(w0, w1), w3), wi(wi(w3, w0), w0))
  con4d(wi(wi(w0, w1), w3), wi(w3, w0), w0)
  pm2.43d(wi(wi(w0, w1), w3), wn(w0), wn(wi(w3, w0)))
  imim12i(wi(w0, w1), w3, wn(w0), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(w3, w0))))
  pm2.21(w0, w1)
  mth8(w3, w0)
  imor(wi(w0, w1), w3)
  imor(wi(w3, w0), w0)
  pm1.5(w4, wn(wi(w3, w0)), w0)
  pm1.5(w2, wn(wi(w3, w0)), wo(w4, w0))
  imor(wi(w0, w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4)))
  imor(wi(w3, w0), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0)))
  imor(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4)))
  imor(wo(wn(w3), w0), wo(w2, wo(w4, w0)))
}

blocks.name: meran2
blocks.content: A single axiom for propositional calculus discovered by C. A. Meredith. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: meran3
blocks.content: A single axiom for propositional calculus discovered by C. A. Meredith. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm meran3(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wo(wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4)))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w2), w0)), wo(w4, wo(w3, w0))))
} = {
  imori(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w2), w0)), wo(w4, wo(w3, w0))))
  syl(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w2), w0)), wo(w4, wo(w3, w0))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w4, wo(w2, w3))))
  3imtr3i(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w4, wo(w2, w3))), wi(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wi(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w4, wo(w2, w3))))
  syl6(wi(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4))), wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w4, wo(w2, w3)), wo(w2, wo(w4, w3)))
  imim2i(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4)), wo(w2, wo(w4, w3)))
  pm2.3(w2, w3, w4)
  pm1.5(w2, w4, w3)
  imor(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w2, wo(w3, w4)))
  imor(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(w4, wo(w2, w3)))
  imorri(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(w4, wo(w2, w3))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w2), w0)), wo(w4, wo(w3, w0))))
  meran1(w0, w1, w4, w2, w3)
}

blocks.name: waj-ax
blocks.content: A single axiom for propositional calculus discovered by Mordchaj Wajsberg (Logical Works, Polish Academy of Sciences, 1977). See: Fitelson, _Some recent results in algebra and logical calculi obtained using automated reasoning_, 2003 (axiom W on slide 8). (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm waj-ax(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))), wnan(w0, wnan(w0, w1))))
} = {
  mpbir(wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))), wnan(w0, wnan(w0, w1)))), wi(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wa(wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))), wnan(w0, wnan(w0, w1)))))
  sylbi(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wa(wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))), wnan(w0, wnan(w0, w1))), wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)))
  nannan(w0, w1, w2)
  jca(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))), wnan(w0, wnan(w0, w1)))
  sylib(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))), wi(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(w0, w3)))
  3imtr4g(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wnan(w3, w2), wnan(w0, w3), wn(wa(w3, w2)), wn(wa(w0, w3)))
  con3d(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(w3, w2), wa(w0, w3))
  syl5com(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w2), wi(w0, w2))
  imim2i(w0, wa(w1, w2), w2)
  simpr(w1, w2)
  expdimp(w0, w3, wi(w0, w2), wa(w3, w2))
  anim2d(w0, w3, wi(w0, w2), w2)
  pm2.27(w0, w2)
  df-nan(w3, w2)
  df-nan(w0, w3)
  nanim(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(w0, w3))
  sylibr(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wa(w0, w1)))
  a2i(w0, wa(w1, w2), wa(w0, w1))
  com12(w0, wa(w1, w2), wa(w0, w1))
  adantr(w1, w2, wi(w0, wa(w0, w1)))
  pm3.21(w1, w0)
  nannan(w0, w0, w1)
  nannan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))), wnan(w0, wnan(w0, w1)))
}

blocks.name: lukshef-ax2
blocks.content: A single axiom for propositional calculus discovered by Jan Lukasiewicz. See: Fitelson, _Some recent results in algebra and logical calculi obtained using automated reasoning_, 2003 (axiom L2 on slide 8). (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 14-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm lukshef-ax2(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w0)), wnan(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3)))))
} = {
  mpbir(wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w0)), wnan(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))), wi(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wa(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w0)), wnan(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))))
  4syl(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wa(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w0)), wnan(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3)))), wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wi(w0, wa(w2, w0)), wi(wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w1))), wa(wi(w0, wa(w2, w0)), wi(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(w0, w3))))
  biimpi(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)))
  nannan(w0, w1, w2)
  syl2anc(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wi(w0, wa(w2, w0)), wi(wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w1))), wi(w0, w2), wi(wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w1)))
  imim2i(w0, wa(w1, w2), w2)
  simpr(w1, w2)
  syl5com(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w1), wi(w0, w1))
  imim2i(w0, wa(w1, w2), w1)
  simpl(w1, w2)
  expdimp(w0, w3, wi(w0, w1), wa(w3, w1))
  anim2d(w0, w3, wi(w0, w1), w1)
  pm2.27(w0, w1)
  anim1i(wi(w0, w2), wi(wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w1)), wi(w0, wa(w2, w0)))
  ancr(w0, w2)
  anim2i(wi(w0, wa(w2, w0)), wi(wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w1)), wi(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(w0, w3)))
  3imtr4g(wi(wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w1)), wnan(w3, w1), wnan(w0, w3), wn(wa(w3, w1)), wn(wa(w0, w3)))
  con3(wa(w0, w3), wa(w3, w1))
  df-nan(w3, w1)
  df-nan(w0, w3)
  anim12i(wi(w0, wa(w2, w0)), wi(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(w0, w3)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w0)), wnan(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))
  biimpri(wi(w0, wa(w2, w0)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w0)))
  nannan(w0, w2, w0)
  biimpi(wi(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(w0, w3)), wnan(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))
  nanim(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(w0, w3))
  nannan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w0)), wnan(wnan(w3, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))
}

blocks.name: arg-ax
blocks.content: A single axiom for propositional calculus discovered by Ken Harris and Branden Fitelson. See: Fitelson, _Some recent results in algebra and logical calculi obtained using automated reasoning_, 2003 (axiom HF1 on slide 8). (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 14-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm arg-ax(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3)))))
} = {
  mpbir(wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))), wi(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wa(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))))
  ancli(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))
  3imtr4i(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3))), wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wi(wnan(w3, w2), wa(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))
  syl5bi(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wnan(w3, w2), wa(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3)), wn(wa(w3, w2)))
  df-nan(w3, w2)
  syl6(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wn(wa(w3, w2)), wa(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3)), wa(wn(wa(w2, w3)), wn(wa(w0, w3))))
  con1d(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(w3, w2), wa(wn(wa(w2, w3)), wn(wa(w0, w3))))
  syl5bi(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wn(wa(wn(wa(w2, w3)), wn(wa(w0, w3)))), wa(w3, w2), wo(wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w3)))
  pm4.57(wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w3))
  syl6(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wo(wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w3)), wa(w3, w2), wa(w2, w3))
  syl(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wi(wo(wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w3)), wa(w2, w3)), wi(wo(w2, w0), w2))
  com12(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wo(w2, w0), w2)
  jad(wo(w2, w0), w0, wa(w1, w2), w2)
  com12(wo(w2, w0), wn(w0), w2)
  orel2(w0, w2)
  a1i(wo(w2, w0), wi(wa(w1, w2), w2))
  simpr(w1, w2)
  3imtr4i(wi(wo(w2, w0), w2), wi(wo(wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w3)), wa(w2, w3)), wa(wi(w2, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wa(wi(wa(w2, w3), wa(w2, w3)), wi(wa(w0, w3), wa(w2, w3))))
  anim12i(wi(w2, w2), wi(w0, w2), wi(wa(w2, w3), wa(w2, w3)), wi(wa(w0, w3), wa(w2, w3)))
  pm3.45(w2, w2, w3)
  pm3.45(w0, w2, w3)
  jaob(w2, w0, w2)
  jaob(wa(w2, w3), wa(w0, w3), wa(w2, w3))
  pm3.22(w2, w3)
  anim12i(wn(wa(w2, w3)), wn(wa(w0, w3)), wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3))
  biimpri(wn(wa(w2, w3)), wnan(w2, w3))
  df-nan(w2, w3)
  biimpri(wn(wa(w0, w3)), wnan(w0, w3))
  df-nan(w0, w3)
  nannan(w0, w1, w2)
  nannan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3))
  nannan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, w2), wnan(wnan(w2, w3), wnan(w0, w3))))
}
